VcatPy’s Documentation 1.0¶

Contents¶

  • Home
  • Using Photon
  • Available elements
  • Available Graphical customization

Photon is a GUi created to make simple 1D plot in python. It uses mainly matplotlib and PyQt5 and it has been build in the spirit of begin fully customizable. You can change fontstyle, fontsize, fontcolors, linewidth of the axes, thickness, etc. Once a customization is created, you can save it into a configuration file and reload it later when you open photon again. The main tool is a graphical user interface and it is started using a command line interface.

Contribute!

If you have any comment or anything you would like to be added to photon, or, even better, if you want to modify you can either do it yourself or please feel free to contact me! —> @ the.spartan.proj@gmail.com
